title: Self-Directed Learning Course for Improving Disaster Management Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of disaster management concepts and online learning experience
context.additional_context: An asynchronous online intermediate-level disaster management literacy program for current practitioners, operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search for required information using keywords related to disaster management
Learners can systematically acquire response strategies for different disaster types by constructing a customized content dashboard
Learners can diagnose and improve their disaster management literacy levels through quiz functionalities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
